## What is this Funky Look?

Yes, it looks pretty cheesy, almost back to 1996, but there's a purpose. I'm exploring how to setup a jekyll dev env and push to github-pages. It's a bit quirky, but fun.

Liquid Syntax is new to me, but just another (templating) language.

Interesting side note: Shopify created it
